description:
Welcome to your once in a lifetime opportunity to acquire this lifestyle property tucked up in the hills of Jamberoo Mountain. Perched on 28 acres of rolling pastures providing the astute buyer the chance to purchase a large versatile property.

For many, the Illawarra represents the ultimate dream escape to idyllic surrounds, just 90 minutes from Sydney. Here, on the outskirts of Albion Park township, you'll be pleased to discover that dreams can come true. Being offered for the first time in 24 years is your chance to own your very own piece of paradise.

Located just a few minutes' drive to schools and Albion Park town centre this stunning property is just far enough up the gentle hill to feel a million miles from it all. On arrival, you'll find the home stead, the perfect spot to put your bags down and freshen up - thanks to its gas, electric and septic connection and water tanks.

The large brand-new machinery sheds are adjacent to the home. In fact, everything you need to establish a successful small farm is here, including, fenced paddocks, a cattle mustering yard, 12-tonne excavator, back hoe, tractor/mower and attachments. The properties footprint sits on a small rise that enjoys panoramic sweeping views across the entire Illawarra, a truly blissful outlook. This property combines coastal living with rural benefits and breathtaking views across Lake Illawarra, the ocean and beyond.

The Main residence – The north facing home comprising of three bedrooms. The master bedroom is complete with walk-in robe and ensuite, the two other bedrooms are serviced by the large family bathroom. The multiple living zones enjoy impressive views out of every window. The kitchen has a functional layout with great storage and bench space while giving you flexibility between the breakfast bar or dining room. The undercover entertaining area is enclosed so it can be enjoyed all year round. Your heating and cooling needs are covered with the woodfire heater, and a revere cycle split system throughout. Downstairs you'll be impressed by the large wine cellar that is could also be used as a gym, storage area or workshop.

Granny Flat - A fully self-contained two-bedroom unit adjoins to the main residence by a glass foyer. Both bedrooms have built in robes and are serviced by their own bathroom. The open plan kitchen, living and dining room also enjoy the magnificent views. This is the perfect scenario for elderly parents as the unit is all on one level, or the option to rent it out and create an income…long term or short farm stays.

Beautifully nestled within a private, established landscape and capturing dramatic views from every angle, this deceptively large traditional country residence is a beautiful tranquil haven set on approximately 28-acres just minutes from town or a short 15-minutes' drive to any one of Shellharbour's popular beaches.

An opportunity of the type is rarely brought to market and an inspection will truly reveal the uniqueness this property provides. I look forward to seeing you at one of our private inspections.

Inspection by private appointment only.

Disclaimer: All information contained herein is obtained from property owners or third-party sources which we believe are reliable. We have no reason to doubt its accuracy, however we cannot guarantee it. All interested person/s should rely on their own enquiries.
